news.title: Inflation rate hit 3.0% in September, lower than expected, long-awaited CPI report shows
news.summary: The annual inflation rate as measured by the CPI was expected to be 3.1% in September, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

news.title: Trump terminates all U.S. trade negotiations with Canada over Reagan tariffs TV ad
news.summary: President Trump claimed Canada had ran an ad featuring former President Ronald Reagan talking about tariffs to influence a pending U.S. Supreme Court case.

news.title: Social Security Administration announces 2026 COLA benefit increase of 2.8% — what it means for you
news.summary: The Social Security cost-of-living adjustment for 2026 will give millions of beneficiaries an increase. Here's how much to expect.

news.title: Procter & Gamble beats earnings estimates but reveals waning demand in some categories
news.summary: P&G CEO Jon Moeller noted a "challenging consumer and geopolitical environment" Moeller: "We are in a challenging environment"

news.title: Disney warns ESPN, other networks may go out on YouTube TV at the end of the month
news.summary: YouTube TV is at risk of losing access to Disney's networks, including ABC and ESPN. YouTube TV reached a carriage agreement with NBCUniversal less than a month ago.

news.title: Beyond Meat jumps on the latest twist in its meme-stock saga
news.summary: The meat-substitute company announced preliminary third-quarter results early Friday. Shares of Beyond Meat have been on a wild meme-stock ride recently.

news.title: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?
news.summary: “The attorney for my late father stated that all beneficiaries needed to wait 10 months before disbursements from the sale of the home could be released.”

news.title: Social Security’s COLA will be 2.8% in 2026 — first pertc
news.summary: Social Security’s cost-of-living adjustment will be 2.8% in 2026, up from 2.5% this year.

news.title: This strategist’s theory of relativity says it’s time to be underweight U.S. stocks
news.summary: Japan and emerging markets should be bought says Ned Davis Research strategist. Japan and emerging market should be buying says NedDavis Research strategist Ned Davis.

news.title: You can be a supersaver for retirement — but it’ll cost you
news.summary: Not spending your money could bring a higher tax bill and a lower enjoyment of life. Not spending money could also lead to a lower quality of life, experts say.
